findings.message:
daoPOLSKAtokens.FundsTransfer (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#431-434) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! owner.send(this.balance) (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#433)
findings.name: arbitrary-send

findings.message:
Reentrancy in daoPOLSKAtokens.sendTokenAw (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#366-376):
	External calls:
	- t.coinContract.transfer(receiver,amount) (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#374)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numTransfers (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#375)
findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth

findings.message:
daoPOLSKAtokens.sendTokenAw (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#366-376) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-t.coinContract.transfer(receiver,amount) (0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#374)
findings.name: unused-return

findings.message: SafeMath.assert (function @ 0x19cf8481ea15427a98ba3cdd6d9e14690011ab10.sol#75-79) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
findings.name: shadowing-builtin
